articles.description: Steven Seagal pushed Russia's narrative at a prison where more than 50 Ukrainian POWs were killed. Both countries accuse the other for the strike.
articles.content:

articles.description: Donald Trump has fought all year to keep the NY Attorney General's office from questioning him. On Wednesday morning, he arrived at their NYC offices.
articles.content:
Donald Trump arrived Wednesday morning for his long-delayed, court-ordered deposition in New York Attorney General Letitia James' three-year probe of the Trump Organization.

articles.author: Ben Winck
articles.title: US CPI inflation cools to 8.5% in July, beating forecasts
articles.description: The Consumer Price Index — a closely watched inflation yardstick — rose 8.5% in the year through July, easing from the previous month's sky-high pace.
articles.content:
Spenders, rejoice.
